name: agent_generated_blender_mcp_comprehensive
description: Comprehensive MCP server for Blender integration providing 47+ tools covering scene management, object operations, materials, mesh operations, animation, rendering, file I/O, and camera/lighting systems. Enables AI systems to programmatically interact with Blender's 3D creation capabilities through a secure, well-documented MCP interface.
description_for_agent: Comprehensive Blender MCP server with 47+ tools for 3D scene creation, object manipulation, materials, animation, rendering, and file operations. Provides complete Blender API access through Model Context Protocol for AI-driven 3D modeling workflows.

BLENDER_HOST.description: Host address for Blender socket server (default: localhost)

BLENDER_PORT.description: Port number for Blender socket server (default: 9876)
